text: I know that first impressions are hard to get passed, especially the smell, but if you follow the instructions you will enjoy them as a substitution for real pasta.  Just rinse them well, parch them in boiling water, and pat dry.  Then add them to whatever sauce, oil, broth, meat and veggies you want.  Miracle Noodle has a recipe book to download on their company website if you need any ideas.  We usually cook them as a spaghetti and enjoy.  I am anxious to try to the other pasta versions available.
